Q

Queen - Class in pieces
Queen Piece
Queen(boolean, int, int, Board) - Constructor for class pieces.Queen
Implements the Piece method to create a Queen piece using the arguments boolean side which is the current turn's side, int rowNum which the the current row number integer colLet which is the current column number, and Board board which is a 2D array of Piece objects.
